meico.svg

Class SvgCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.svg.SvgCollection

  • public class SvgCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class interfaces a collection of SVGs. One such SVG is one page of the score. This class comprizes the whole score.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt

        writes the SVGs to files; if there is already a file with this name, it is replaces!
